workExperience.title: Work Experience

project.name: Mettler Health Care (Hospital Management Web Application)
project.description: I contributed to developing a web application for managing a psychiatric healthcare facility, ensuring role-based access for super admins, admins, staff, and patients to streamline hospital operations.

features.title: Authentication & Authorization
details: Implemented secure user authentication using JWT (JSON Web Token) to differentiate between admin and user roles.
Users can register, log in, and log out, ensuring session management and protection against unauthorized access.

features.title: Admin Dashboard
details: Admins can add, update, and delete products from the store.
Admins can view all customer orders, update their statuses (pending, shipped, delivered), and manage inventory.
Admins can view registered users, control access, and manage customer interactions.

features.title: User Features
details: Users can browse various categories of products with details like price, description, and images.
Implemented 'Add to Cart' functionality, allowing users to modify quantities before checkout.
Users can place orders, choose payment methods, and track their purchases.

features.title: Secure Payments (Stripe Integration)
details: Integrated Stripe Payment Gateway for handling secure credit/debit card transactions.
Implemented real-time transaction validation, ensuring smooth checkout experiences.

features.title: Responsive & User-Friendly UI
details: Designed a modern, mobile-friendly UI using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap/Tailwind CSS for an engaging shopping experience.

features.title: Database Management
details: Used MongoDB for efficient product and user data storage.
Implemented schema validation and indexing for optimized performance.

keyAchievements: Implemented AI-powered form processing using OpenAI to extract and populate patient details from recorded doctor-patient conversations, reducing administrative effort.
Developed a doctor-patient conversation recording feature that transcribes and structures audio into separate dialogues for efficient storage and retrieval.
Designed and built a dynamic form creation system that allows medical staff to create customizable forms with AI-driven field mapping.
Integrated OpenAI to process conversation data and auto-fill medical forms based on predefined prompt messages, improving accuracy and efficiency.
Optimized psychiatric documentation workflows by reducing manual data entry and streamlining hospital operations with role-based access controls.

project.name: Shopping (E-Commerce Website)
project.description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform with admin and user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and Stripe payment integration.

Responsive UI for mobile and desktop users
